anya-e0804n2:165_7: so pana kattubhūto kammabhūto ca attho bhijjamāno nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṁ “bhijjatīti attho”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:166_0: Atha vā ruppatīti rūpanti kammakattutthe rūpapadasiddhi vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:166_2: teneva bhijjatīti atthoti kammakattutthena bhijjatīti saddena atthaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0804n2:166_5: Yadā pana “ruppatī”ti padaṁ kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā,
anya-e0804n2:167_0: Rūpasaddo khandha bhava nimitta paccaya sarīra vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n2:167_1: Ayañhi “yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe vattati.
anya-e0804n2:167_6: “Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre.
anya-e0804n2:167_7: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe.
anya-e0804n2:168_0: Khandhe bhave nimitte ca, sarīre paccayepi ca;
anya-e0804n2:170_0: Kupa kope. Kuppati. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa. Kopo, pakopo. Vacīpakopaṁ rakkheyya.
anya-e0804n2:178_3: Ettha pana “lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṁ rāgo taṇhā tasiṇā mucchā ejā vanaṁ vanatho” iccādīni lobhassa bahunāmāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:180_0: Samu upasame. Cittaṁ sammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, samaṇo, santi, santo.
anya-e0804n2:181_0: Ettha samaṇoti sammati santacitto bhavatīti samaṇo.
anya-e0804n2:181_1: Kāritavasena pana kilese sameti upasametīti samaṇoti nibbacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:183_1: “Ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve.
anya-e0804n2:183_2: “Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:187_0: Damu damane. Dammati. Danto, damo, damanaṁ. Kārite “cittaṁ dameti, damayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:188_2: Vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṁvaro “damo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n2:188_4: khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā “damo”ti vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:188_5: “Dānena damena saṁyamena saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṁ “damo”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:192_1: pariyāyasaddo vāradesanākāraṇesu samantato gantabbaṭṭhāne ca sadise ca vattati.
anya-e0804n2:192_2: “Kassa nu kho ānanda ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre vattati.
anya-e0804n2:192_4: “Imināpi kho te rājañña pariyāyena evaṁ hotū”tiādīsu kāraṇe.
anya-e0804n2:196_0: Vilī vilīnabhāve. Sappi vilīyati. Kārite vilāpayati.
anya-e0804n2:202_0: Sā antakammani. Siyati anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasanti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:203_0: Sā assādane. Rasaṁ sāyati. Sāyitaṁ, sāyanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:204_0: Si pāṇippasave. Sūyati, pasūyati. Pasūtā gāvī.
anya-e0804n2:209_0: Līsa appībhāve. Lissati. Leso. “Lisa lesane”tipi paṭhanti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n2:210_0: Tasa pipāsāyaṁ. Tassati, paritassati. Paritassanā, tasiṇā, tasito.
anya-e0804n2:211_0: Dusa dosane. Dussati. Doso, dosanaṁ, dosito.
anya-e0804n2:212_0: Dusa appītiyaṁ. Dussati, padussati. Doso, padoso, duṭṭho, paduṭṭho, dūsako, dūsito, dūsanā.
anya-e0804n2:213_0: Asu khepe. Khepo khipanaṁ. Assati. Nirassatiādiyati ca dhammaṁ. Issāso.
anya-e0804n2:214_0: Ettha ca nirassatīti chaḍḍeti satthāraṁ tathā dhammakkhānādīni.
anya-e0804n2:216_0: Ettha ca yena vinayakammena “nissāya te vatthabba”nti niyassiyati bhajāpiyatīti niyaso bālaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:216_2: “Karohi me yakkha niyasakamma”nti ettha pana niggahakammaṁ niyasakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n2:218_0: Vasa sadde. Sakuṇo vassati. Adhamo migajātānaṁ, siṅgālo tāta vassati. Maṇḍūko vassati.
anya-e0804n2:219_5: cara pire vinassa. Naṭṭho, vinaṭṭho. Kārite – nāseti, nāsayati.
anya-e0804n2:222_3: Bhāve “bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vā,
anya-e0804n2:222_4: so pahīyissatī”ti ca “rāgo pahīyatī”ti ca rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:222_6: “Rāgo pahīyatī”ti idaṁ pana “hā cāge”ti vuttassa bhūvādigaṇikadhātussa rūpaṁ “rāgaṁ pajahatī”ti kattupadassa dassanato.
anya-e0804n2:223_0: Naha bandhane. Nayhati. Upanayhati. Sannayhati. Sannāho. Sannaddho.
anya-e0804n2:226_4: Ettha ca sīsaṁ nhātoti sīsaṁ dhovitvā nhātoti attho gahetabbo porāṇehi anumatattā.
anya-e0804n2:228_3: Tathā hi “viriḷitoti lajjito”ti atthasaṁvaṇṇakā garū vadanti “lajjanākārappatto”ti ca.
anya-e0804n2:229_0: Divādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:233_9: Anabbhāsavisaye – sāvako, soto, suṇaṁ, suṇanto, suṇamāno,
anya-e0804n2:233_11: Asuyitthāti vā sutaṁ. Sutavā, sotaṁ, soṇo, suṇituṁ, sotuṁ. Suṇitvā, suṇiya, suṇiyāna, sutvā, sutvāna. Kārite – sāveti, sāvayati. Kamme –
anya-e0804n2:234_2: tattha āgatapphalo savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātoti “sāvako”ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n2:235_0: Ettha sutasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vadāma saddhiṁ sotasaddassa atthuddhārena.
anya-e0804n2:242_6: yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni paṭṭhapitāni vivaritāni vibhattāni uttānīkatāni pakāsitāni.
anya-e0804n2:242_8: Taṇhāsoto diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto”tiādīsu pañcasu dhammesu.
anya-e0804n2:242_9: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṁ dārukkhandhaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu udakadhārāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:242_12: “Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṁ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṁ idhaloke patiṭṭhitañca paraloke patiṭṭhitañcā”tiādīsu cittasantatiyanti.
anya-e0804n2:243_0: Soṇoti sunakho. So hi sāmikassa vacanaṁ suṇātīti soṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:245_0: Sunakho sārameyyo ca, suṇo sūno ca kukkuro;
anya-e0804n2:246_0: Soṇo svāno suvāno ca, sāḷuro migadaṁsano.
anya-e0804n2:248_0: Sunakhī kukkurī sī’ti, ime itthīsu vattare.
anya-e0804n2:251_0: Kukkuroti ayaṁ tattha, bālakāle ravena ve;
anya-e0804n2:253_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā kukkurajātake “ye kukkurā rājakulamhi vaḍḍhā,
anya-e0804n2:253_1: koleyyakā vaṇṇabalūpapannā”tiimasmiṁpadese evamatthaṁ vaṇṇayiṁsu “ye kukkurāti ye sunakhā.
anya-e0804n2:253_2: Yathā hi taruṇopi passāvo pūtimuttanti tadahujātopi siṅgālo “jarasiṅgālo’ti,
anya-e0804n2:256_1: So hi parahitaṁ sakahitañca kātuṁ sakkuṇātīti sakko.
anya-e0804n2:256_3: Tathā hi “atha kho mahānāmo sakko”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:256_5: Sakyā vata bho kumārā paramasakyā vata bho kumārā”ti vacanamupādāya sabbepi sakyakule jātā “sakyā”ti ca “sākiyā”ti ca “sakkā”ti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0804n2:256_6: Ettha svādittepi anekassaradhātuto ekova uṇāpaccayo hoti,
anya-e0804n2:257_0: Khīkhaye. Khīṇoti. Khīṇāti. Khīṇā jāti. Khīṇo. Ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo.
anya-e0804n2:259_0: Ci caye. Ṇakārassa nakārattaṁ. Pākāraṁ cinoti. Citaṁ kusalaṁ. Ceto puggalo.
anya-e0804n2:261_0: Rādha sādha saṁsiddhiyaṁ. Rādhuṇāti. Sādhuṇāti. Rādhanaṁ. Ārādhanaṁ. Sādhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:262_0: Pī pītiyaṁ. Pīṇoti, pīṇāti. Pīti, piyo.
anya-e0804n2:263_0: Apa pāpuṇe sambhu ca. Pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti. Patto.
anya-e0804n2:264_0: Tattha pattoti pasaddo upasaggo “pappotī”ti ettha pasaddo viya.
anya-e0804n2:264_1: Tathā hi “patto”ti ettha pāpuṇīti atthe papubbassa apadhātussa pakāre lutte tapaccayassa dvibhāvo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:265_0: Khipa khepe. Khipuṇāti. Khippaṁ. Khippanti macchapañjaro.
anya-e0804n2:268_0: Ettha ca sabbaguyhesu nimiyati pakkhipiyatīti mitto.
anya-e0804n2:268_1: “Mitto have sattapadena hotī”ti vacanaṁ pana vohāravasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:268_4: yo koci avissāsiko attano paṭiviruddhopi ca mitto nāma bhaveyya,
anya-e0804n2:268_6: Evañca pana daṭṭhabbaṁ “sattapadavītihāramattenapi saha gacchanto saha gacchantassa piyavācānicchāraṇena
anya-e0804n2:268_7: aññamaññaṁ ālāpasallāpakaraṇamattena mitto nāma hotīti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:268_9: Daḷhavissāso mitto nāma na bhaveyyāti mittassa guṇapasaṁsāvasena evaṁ vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n2:269_0: Vu saṁvaraṇe. Vuṇoti, vuṇāti, saṁvuṇoti, saṁvuṇāti. Paṇḍito sīlasaṁvuto.
anya-e0804n2:270_0: Su abhisave. Abhisavo nāma pīḷanaṁ manthanaṁ sandhānaṁ sinhānaṁ vā. Suṇoti, suṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:273_0: Na hi nūnāyaṁ sā khujjā, labhati jivhāya chedanaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:276_0: Vusa pāgabbiye. Pāgabbiyaṁ nāma kāyavācāmanehi pagabbabhāvo. Vusuṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:279_0: Ettha pana asamānantattepi samānatthānaṁ samodhānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:280_0: Tika tiga sagha dikkha kivi ciri jiri dāsa du hiṁsāyaṁ. Tikuṇāti. Tiguṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:280_2: Dikkhuṇāti. Kivuṇāti. Ciruṇāti. Jiruṇāti. Dāsuṇāti. Duṇoti,
anya-e0804n2:281_0: Suvādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:285_1: Dabbavinimayo kayavikkayavasena bhaṇḍassa parivattanaṁ. Kiṇāti, kiṇanti.
anya-e0804n2:286_0: Khi gatiyaṁ. Khiṇāti. Atikhiṇo saro. Khaṁ, khāni. Nakārassa ṇakārattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:287_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “cāpātikhiṇāti cāpato atikhiṇā cāpā vinimuttāti attho”ti padatthavivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n2:287_6: tampi gatatthaññeva sandhāya adhippāyatthavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:288_14: “Sañcayo rāsi samūho piṇḍo gaṇo saṅgho kadambo vaggo karo ghaṭā”iccevamādayo pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:289_0: Ji jaye. Jināti, vijināti, jiniyati. Jetā, jino.
anya-e0804n2:289_2: Māraṁ jito. Jitavā, jitāvī, jitabbo, jeyyo, jayanaṁ, jitaṁ, vijitaṁ, jayo,
anya-e0804n2:290_6: Iti pāpake akusale dhamme mārādayo ca arayo ajinīti jino.
anya-e0804n2:291_0: “Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhayaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:292_0: Jitā me pāpakā dhammā, tasmāhaṁ upaka jino”ti,
anya-e0804n2:294_1: sopapado pana paccekabuddhādīsu tamhi ca yathārahaṁ pavattati.
anya-e0804n2:295_3: putte ca dāre ca tatheva jino.
anya-e0804n2:297_0: Thu abhitthave. Thunāti. Abhitthunāti. Thuti, abhitthuti. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuto, abhitthuto.
anya-e0804n2:305_0: Ettha mittaddūti mittaṁ dunāti hiṁsati dubbhatīti mittaddu.
anya-e0804n2:306_0: Dhū kampane. Dhunāti. Dhūmo, dhonā, dhono, dhuto. Dhunanto vākacīrāni, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e0804n2:307_1: Dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāyaṁ pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n2:307_2: “Kodho dhūmo bhasmāni mosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati.
anya-e0804n2:307_4: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī”ti ettha vitakke.
anya-e0804n2:310_0: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsito,
anya-e0804n2:315_4: Yaṁ tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca,
anya-e0804n2:315_5: vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca.
anya-e0804n2:315_7: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṁ dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca,
anya-e0804n2:315_10: pakappitā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū”ti ayamettha pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:316_1: Imasmiṁ ṭhāne dhātuyā ākhyātatte ekantena antalopo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:316_2: Sobhitattheragāthāyaṁ pana anāgatavacane ukārassa vuddhivasena “ahaṁ monena monissa”nti rūpantarañca dissati.
anya-e0804n2:316_5: Tattha monanti kiñcāpi “na monena muni hotī”ti ettha tuṇhībhāvo “mona”nti vuccati,
anya-e0804n2:316_6: tathāpi idha “ñāṇe”ti vacanato na so adhippeto,
anya-e0804n2:316_9: Munīti munāti jānāti hitāhitaṁ paricchindatīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:316_10: Atha vā khandhādiloke tulaṁ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā,
anya-e0804n2:316_11: ime bāhirā”tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munātīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:318_0: Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n2:319_0: Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa muni tena so muni;
anya-e0804n2:320_0: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:321_4: So panesa agāriyamuni anagāriyamuni sekkhamuni asekkhamuni paccekamuni munimunīti anekavidho.
anya-e0804n2:321_11: Tathā hi āyasmāpi sāriputto āha “munīti vuccati tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho”ti.
anya-e0804n2:322_0: Pū pavane. Pavanaṁ sodhanaṁ. Punāti. Puññaṁ, putto, dantapoṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_0: Ettha ca puññanti attano kārakaṁ punāti sodhetīti puññaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_1: Atha vā yattha sayaṁ uppannaṁ taṁsantānaṁ punāti visodhetīti puññaṁ. Kintaṁ?
anya-e0804n2:323_4: Puttoti attano kulaṁ punāti sodhetīti putto.
anya-e0804n2:323_5: Evañca sati hīnajaccānaṁ caṇḍālādīnaṁ putto nāma na bhaveyyāti na vattabbaṁ saddānamatthakathanassa nānappakārena pavattito,
anya-e0804n2:323_6: tasmā attano pitu hadayaṁ pūretīti puttoti evamādināpi nibbacanaṁ gahetabbameva.
anya-e0804n2:324_0: Putto ca nāma atrajo khetrajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidho.
anya-e0804n2:324_1: Tattha attānaṁ paṭicca jāto atrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n2:324_2: Sayanapīṭhe pallaṅke ureti evamādīsu nibbatto khetrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n2:324_4: Posāpanatthāya dinno dinnako nāma dantapoṇanti dante punanti visodhenti etenāti dantapoṇaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:326_0: Sā panesā khuddakāpīti khaṇikāpīti okkantikāpīti ubbegāpīti pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_1: Tattha khuddakāpīti sarīre lomahaṁsanamattameva kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_3: Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṁ vīci viya kāyaṁ okkamitvā okkamitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0804n2:326_4: Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṁ uddhaggaṁ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā hoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_5: Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṁ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anupariphuṭaṁ hoti,
anya-e0804n2:326_7: sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇattā “piṇātī”ti pītīti suddhakattuvasenapi vattuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0804n2:328_0: Ettha manoti ekāya nāḷiyā ekāya ca tulāya minamāno viya ārammaṇaṁ mināti paricchindatīti mano.
anya-e0804n2:330_1: Macchassa hi “mīno maccho ambujo vārijo vāricaro”ti anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n2:330_2: Visesanāmāni pana “amaro khaliso candakulo kandaphali indaphali indavalo kuliso vāmi kuṅkutalo kaṇḍiko
anya-e0804n2:330_3: sakulo maṅguro siṅgī satavaṅko rohito pāṭhīno kāṇo savaṅko pāvuso” iccevamādīni,
anya-e0804n2:330_5: Kumīnanti kucchitenākārena macche minanti hiṁsanti etenāti kumīnaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:335_0: Ettha munīti attano cittaṁ munāti mavati bandhati rāgadosādivasaṁ gantuṁ na detīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:336_0: Ri gatidesanesu. Rikāti. Reṇu. Nakārassa ṇattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:337_0: Lī silese. Lināti, nilināti. Līnaṁ, sallīnaṁ, paṭisallānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:338_3: idaṁ kho āvuso cīvaraṁ maṁ uddissa viyyati. Vītaṁ. Suvītaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:338_6: tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpessāmā’ti cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ” iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:339_0: Vī hiṁsāyaṁ. Vināti. Veṇu. Veṇūti vaṁso.
anya-e0804n2:340_0: Lū chedane. Lunāti. Loṇaṁ, kusalaṁ, bālo, lūto.
anya-e0804n2:341_0: Ettha ca loṇanti lunāti vītarasabhāvaṁ vināseti sarasabhāvaṁ karotīti loṇaṁ, lavaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:341_1: Kuso viya hatthappadesaṁ akusaladhamme lunātīti kusalaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:341_3: Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike dve atthe lunātīti bālo, avidvā.
anya-e0804n2:341_6: Yūsaṁ pātuṁ paṭaṅgamakkhikādīnaṁ jīvitaṁ lunātīti lūto.
anya-e0804n2:343_0: Ettha sīmāti sinīyate samaggena saṅghena kammavācāya bandhiyateti sīmā.
anya-e0804n2:343_3: Sināti bandhati kese moḷikaraṇavasena etthāti sīsaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:345_0: Su hiṁsāyaṁ. Suṇāti. Parasu. Paraṁ suṇanti hiṁsanti etenāti parasu.
anya-e0804n2:349_0: Ettha ca kilesoti rāgādayopi dukkhampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:356_0: Kiyādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:364_0: Idāni gahādigaṇo vuccate. Ettheke evaṁ maññanti.
anya-e0804n2:367_0: Yato ppaṇhā parā heyyuṁ, dhātuto jinasāsane;
anya-e0804n2:368_0: Tepi aññe na vijjanti, aññatra gahadhātuyā.
anya-e0804n2:370_0: Pakkhipiṁsu gaṇe evaṁ, na vadiṁsu gahādikaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:371_0: Na tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ dhīro, gaṇheyya suvicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n2:372_0: Yato kaccāyane vutto, gahādīnaṁ gaṇo visuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:373_0: “Gahādito ppaṇhā” iti, lakkhaṇaṁ vadatā hi so;
anya-e0804n2:375_0: Sace visuṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇo nāma na labbhati;
anya-e0804n2:377_0: “Gahato ppaṇhā” icceva, vattabbaṁ atha vā pana;
anya-e0804n2:379_0: Yasmā tathā na vuttañca, na katañcekalakkhaṇaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:380_0: Tasmā ayaṁ visuṁyeva, gaṇo icceva ñāyati.
anya-e0804n2:386_0: Sappayogaṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇaṁ vakkhāmi me suṇa.
anya-e0804n2:387_3: Upasaddo hettha na kiñci atthavisesaṁ vadati.
anya-e0804n2:387_4: Atha vā kāyena cittena vā upagantvā ādānaṁ gahaṇaṁ upādānanti samīpattho upasaddo.

anya-e0804n2:387_6: Idha pana daḷhaggahaṇaṁ vā hotu sithilaggahaṇaṁ vā,
anya-e0804n2:387_8: tasmā gahadhātu gahaṇe vattatīti attho gahetabbo. Gheppati,
anya-e0804n2:387_19: Ahaṁ jāliṁ gahessāmi. Gahetuṁ. Gahetvā. Uggāhako,
anya-e0804n2:387_33: Tathā hi “gaṇhiyanti uggaṇhiyantī”ti niddesapāḷi dissati. “Gehaṁ, gāho,
anya-e0804n2:388_3: Gaṇhasī”ti ca ādinā nayena sabbāsu vibhattīsu sabbathā padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n2:388_4: Ākārekārānantaratyantapadānaṁ “gaṇhāti gaṇhāpetī”tiādinā yathāsambhavaṁ padamālā yojetabbā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṁ vajjetvā.
anya-e0804n2:389_0: Imāni pana pasiddhāni kānici ajjatanīrūpāni “aggahī mattikāpattaṁ. Aggahuṁ,
anya-e0804n2:390_4: “sītaṁ uṇhaṁ paṭihanatī”tiādīsu pana guṇaṁ uṇhabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0804n2:391_0: Tasa vipāsāyaṁ. Taṇhā. Kenaṭṭhena taṇhā? Tassati paritassatīti atthena.
anya-e0804n2:392_0: Jusi pītisevanesu. Juṇho samayo. Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto.
anya-e0804n2:393_0: Tattha juṇhoti joseti lokassa pītiṁsomanassañca uppādetīti juṇho.
anya-e0804n2:394_2: Jotati sayaṁ nippabhāpi samānā candatārakappabhāsenapi dibbati virocati sappabhā hotīti juṇhā.
anya-e0804n2:395_0: Sā tanukaraṇe. Saṇhavācā. Siyati tanukariyati, na pharusabhāvena kakkasā kariyatīti saṇhā.
anya-e0804n2:396_1: Siyati sayaṁ sukhumabhāvena atisukhumampi atthaṁ antaṁ karoti nipphattiṁ pāpetīti saṇhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:397_0: Tija nisāne. Nisānaṁ tikkhatā. Tiṇho parasu. Titikkhatīti tiṇho.
anya-e0804n2:398_4: suti sūramati byākaraṇaṁ chandoviciti nirutti jotisatthaṁ sikkhā mokkhañāṇaṁ kriyāvidhi dhanubbedo hatthisikkhā
anya-e0804n2:398_5: kāmatantaṁ assalakkhaṇaṁ purāṇaṁ itihāso nīti takko vejjakañcāti.
anya-e0804n2:399_0: Ku kucchāyaṁ. Kucchā garahā. Kaṇhā dhammā. Kaṇho puriso.
anya-e0804n2:400_0: Tattha kaṇhāti apabhassarabhāvakaraṇattā paṇḍitehi kucchitabbā garahitabbāti kaṇhā,
anya-e0804n2:400_2: Kāḷavaṇṇattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇādikaṁ upanidhāya kucchitabbo ninditabboti kaṇho,
anya-e0804n2:402_0: Kaṇhe bhūmippadesasmiṁ, na mayhaṁ manaso piyo”ti ca,
anya-e0804n2:411_0: Ākhyātatte ca nāmatte, ṇhāsaddo usato tathā.
anya-e0804n2:414_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi sāsane “taṇhāyatī”ti kriyāpadampi dissati,
anya-e0804n2:414_2: mettāyatī”tiādīni viya nāmasmā vihitassa āyapaccayassa vasena siddhattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_3: “Taṇhāyatī”ti hi idaṁ ṇhāpaccayavatā tasadhātuto nipphannataṇhāsaddasmā parassa āyapaccayassa vasena nipphannaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_4: Tathā kiñcāpi rūpiyasaṁvohārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṁ “vāsiphalaṁ tāpetvā udakaṁ vā khīraṁ vā uṇhāpetī”ti
anya-e0804n2:414_6: tathāpi tassa ṇhāpaccayavatā usadhātuto nipphannauṇhāsaddato vihitassa kāritasaññassa ṇāpepaccayassa
anya-e0804n2:414_7: vasena nipphannattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_0: Kiñca bhiyyo vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “uṇhāpetī”ti kāritapadassa diṭṭhattāyeva “uṇhatī”ti kattupadampi nayato
anya-e0804n2:415_1: diṭṭhameva hoti kattukāritapadānaṁ ekadhātumhi upalabbhamānattā, yathā? Gaṇhati,
anya-e0804n2:415_4: tasmā “usa dāhe”ti dhātussa “uṇhatī”ti rūpaṁ upalabbhatīti mantvā “uṇhatīti uṇha”nti nibbacanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_5: Iti ppapaccayo gahato ca aññato ca ekadhā labbhati,
anya-e0804n2:415_6: ṇhāpaccayo pana gahato usato ca dvidhā aññato ekadhā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_8: tathāpi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane aññānipi ekekassa dhātussa nāmikapadāni dve dve kriyāpadāni vicinitabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:415_9: Yena pana buddhavacanānurūpena nayena gahādigaṇe ādisaddena tasadhātādayo amhehi gahitā,
anya-e0804n2:415_10: imasmā nayā añño nayo pasatthataro natthi,
anya-e0804n2:415_12: tasmā ayaṁ nīti sāsanaṭṭhitiyā āyasmantehi sādhukaṁ dhāretabbā vācetabbā ca.
anya-e0804n2:416_0: Gahādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:421_0: Tattha āyatananti āyabhūte dhamme tanoti vitthāretīti āyatanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:421_2: Tañhi kalalato paṭṭhāya kammādīhi yathāsambhavaṁ taniyyati vitthāriyati mahattaṁ pāpiyatīti “tanū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:421_3: “Tanu vapu sarīraṁ puṁ kāyo deho”tiādayo sarīravācakā saddā.
anya-e0804n2:421_7: na tato attā vā attaniyaṁ vā upalabbhati.
anya-e0804n2:421_9: appatthavācakassa ca tassa kriyāpadaṁ na passāma,
anya-e0804n2:422_0: Tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma. Tanute, tanunte. Tanuse, tanuse, tanuvhe. Tane, tanumhe.
anya-e0804n2:423_0: Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, tane, taneyyuṁ. Vitana, vitanu. Atanā, atanu.
anya-e0804n2:425_1: So hi atthānaṁ sahassampi muhuttena cintanasamatthatāya saparahitaṁ kātuṁ sakkotīti “sakko”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:425_2: Aññatra pana dhātūnaṁ avisaye taddhitavasena sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsīti sakkoti evampi atthaṁ gahetvā sakkasaddo niruttinayena sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:425_3: Vuttañhi bhagavatā “sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0804n2:428_2: Tañhi tiṇiyate tiṇabhakkhehi goṇādīhi adiyate khādiyateti tiṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:430_0: Hanu apanayane. Apanayanaṁ anālāpakaraṇaṁ nibbacanatākaraṇaṁ. Hanoti. Hanute.
anya-e0804n2:432_0: Manu bodhane. Manoti. Manute. Mano. Manaṁ. Mānasaṁ. Manusso. Mānavo. Māṇavo.
anya-e0804n2:433_2: Imesaṁ pana dvinnaṁ manasaddānaṁ “yasmiṁ mano nivisati.
anya-e0804n2:433_3: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hotī”tiādīsu punnapuṁsakaliṅgatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n2:433_6: yvāyaṁ carati mānaso”ti ettha hi rāgo mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:433_9: kālaṁ kayirā jane suto”ti ettha arahattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_1: Mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṁ mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_2: Anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_6: rūpāni manu passatī”ti ettha hi “manū”ti satto vutto.
anya-e0804n2:436_7: Atha vā manūti paṭhamakappikakāle manussānaṁ mātāpibhuṭṭhāne ṭhito manunāmako puriso,
anya-e0804n2:436_9: So hi sakalalokassa hitaṁ kātuṁ manute jānātīti “manū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:436_10: Yathābalaṁ attano hitaṁ manute jānātīti manusso,
anya-e0804n2:436_12: Atha vā vuttappakārassa manuno apaccaṁ manusso.
anya-e0804n2:436_14: nakārassa hi ṇakāre kate “māṇavo”ti rūpaṁ sijjhati.
anya-e0804n2:436_19: na panettha vattabbaṁ “māṇavasaddassa atthuddhāravacane idaṁ vacanaṁ virujjhatī”ti antarasaddassa atthuddhāre
anya-e0804n2:437_1: cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttasmiñhi “subho māṇavotodeyyaputto”ti imasmiṁ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi “subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi pāsādiko,
anya-e0804n2:437_4: so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena vohariyatī”ti evaṁ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa attho pakāsito,
anya-e0804n2:437_5: taṭṭīkāyampi garūhi “yaṁ apaccaṁ kucchitaṁ muddhaṁ vā,
anya-e0804n2:437_7: yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle muddhadhātukā hontīti vuttaṁ ‘taruṇakāle vohariṁsū”ti,
anya-e0804n2:437_12: ye pamajjanti māṇavā”tiādīsu hi satto “māṇavo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n2:439_0: Ettha āpoti appoti taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ vissaratīti āpo.
anya-e0804n2:440_0: Mā parimāṇe. Minoti. Upamā, upamānaṁ, vimānaṁ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:441_0: Ettha ca yā accantaṁ na minoti na vicchindati,
anya-e0804n2:441_1: sā mānassa samīpe vattatīti upamā yathā “goṇo viya gavajo”ti.
anya-e0804n2:441_6: Atha vā upamānanti upametabbākāro “sīho viya bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0804n2:441_10: Ettha pana sātisayattā kiñcāpi sīhassa tejādīhi bhagavato tejādiupametabbākāro natthi,
anya-e0804n2:441_11: tathāpi hīnūpamāvasena “sīho viya bhagavā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:441_12: Vimānanti utusamuṭṭhānattepi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānattā kammena visesato miniyati paricchindiyatīti vimānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:442_0: Kara karaṇe. “Karoti, kayirati, kubbati, krubbati, pakaroti,
anya-e0804n2:442_8: Tasmiṁyevaṭhāne rayakārānaṁ vipariyāye sati na dvebhāvo.
anya-e0804n2:443_0: Ettha ca kayiratīti padaṁ dvīsu ṭhānesu dissati kattari kamme ca.
anya-e0804n2:443_2: kammavasena pana ayaṁ pāḷi “kuṭi me kayirati adesitavatthukā”ti.
anya-e0804n2:443_3: Tattha ca kattuvasena vuttaṁ kattupadaṁ yirapaccayena siddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:443_4: Kammavasena pana vuttaṁ kammapadaṁ ikārāgamassa ādiantabhūtānaṁ rayakārānaṁ vipariyāyenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti,
anya-e0804n2:444_1: tatra paṭhamaṁ “kubbatī”ti padasseva padamālaṁ yojessāma sabbāsu vibhattīsu ekākārena yojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:444_2: “Karotī”ti okārānantaratyantapadassa pana “kāretī”ti ekārānantaratyantapadassa ca padamālaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ pacchā yojessāma ekākārena ayojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:445_0: Tatra kubbati, kubbanti. Kubbasi, kubbatha. Kubbāmi, kubbāma. Kubbate, kubbante. Kubbase, kubbavhe. Kubbe, kubbamhe.
anya-e0804n2:446_0: Pañcamiyādīnaṁ vasena pana kubbatu, kubbantu. Kubbeyya,
anya-e0804n2:447_2: Kubbasī”tiādinā vuttā ayaṁ padamālā pāḷinayadassanato edisī vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:447_3: Saddasatthavidū pana sāsanikā saddasattheyeva ādaraṁ katvā “kubbati,
anya-e0804n2:447_4: kubbasī”ti evaṁpakārāni rūpāni pāḷiyaṁ natthīti maññantā na icchanti.
anya-e0804n2:447_5: Tehi saddasatthe viya pāḷiyampi “asanto nānukubbantī”tiādīsu okārapaccayassādesabhūto ukāro sareyeva pare vakāraṁ pappotīti maññamānā “kubbanti,
anya-e0804n2:447_9: Mayaṁ pana pāḷinayadassanato tāni rūpāni icchāma.
anya-e0804n2:447_10: Atra sotārānaṁ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṁ kiñci pāḷinayaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0804n2:447_19: Tathā hi yathā “agginiṁ sampajjalitaṁ pavisantī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “aggini, agginī, agginayo. Agginiṁ, agginī, agginayo.
anya-e0804n2:448_0: Yathā ca “bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātavedā”ti pāḷigatidassanato “santo sabbhīhi saddhiṁ sataṁ dhammo na jaraṁ
anya-e0804n2:448_1: upetīti pavedayantī”ti aṭṭhakathāgatidassanato ca “sabbhi, sabbhī, sabbhayo. Sabbhiṁ, sabbhī, sabbhayo.
anya-e0804n2:449_0: Idāni yathāpaṭiññātā padamālā anuppattā. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha. Karomi, kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kare, karumhe.
anya-e0804n2:450_0: Karotu, kurutu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurutaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:453_0: Taṁ vivāhaṁ asaṁyuttaṁ, kathaṁ amhe karomase”ti
anya-e0804n2:454_0: Pāḷidassanato “karomase”ti padaṁ kasmā idha na vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:454_1: nanu karadhātuto paraṁ okāraṁ paṭicca āmasevacanassāvayavabhūto ākāro lopaṁ pappotīti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n2:454_6: Evaṁbhūto ca sekāro katthaci nāmikapadato paro hoti “ye keci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse.
anya-e0804n2:456_0: Sutaṁ netaṁ abhiṇhaso, tasmā evaṁ vademase”ti
anya-e0804n2:459_0: Kara, karu. Kare, karittha. Karaṁ, karimha. Karittha, karire. Karittho, karivho. Kariṁ, karimhe.
anya-e0804n2:460_0: Ettha karāti puriso kammaṁ karīti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:460_2: akaraṁ kammadukkaṭa”nti etthāpi “mahārāja bhavaṁ āguṁ karī”ti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:460_3: Evañhi sati ayaṁ payogo “maññe bhavaṁ patthayati,
anya-e0804n2:460_4: rañño bhariyaṁ patibbata”ntiādayo viya paṭhamapurisappayogo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:461_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana majjhimapurisappayogo vutto “āguṁ karāti mahārāja tvaṁ mahāparādhaṁ mahāpāpaṁ kari.
anya-e0804n2:461_1: Dukkaṭanti yaṁ kataṁ dukkaṭaṁ hoti,taṁ lāmakaṁ kammaṁ akara”nti,
anya-e0804n2:461_2: tasmā jātakaṭṭhakathāvasenāpi kadāci karaiti ca karīti ca akaranti ca majjhimapurisappayogo bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:461_10: mā kisittho mayā vinā”ti ettha “kisittho”ti padena samaṁ parokkhāyattanopadamajjhimapurisekavacanavasena,
anya-e0804n2:461_11: ediso pana nayo aññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:462_3: Akarāti puriso kammaṁ akāsīti atītakriyāvācako paṭhamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n2:462_7: mā me udakamāharī”ti ettha pana santepi atītavācakapaṭṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo
anya-e0804n2:463_0: Kiñca bhiyyo “jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti alabbhaneyyaṁ ṭhāna”ntiādīsupi santepi atītavācakapaṭhamapurisappayogabhāve
anya-e0804n2:463_1: māsaddayogato ajjatanīvibhattipañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā “mā jīratū”tiādinā paṭhamapurisappayogārahā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:463_2: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti yaṁ mayhaṁ jarāsabhāvaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:463_7: mayhampetaṁ na ruccatī”ti imāya pāḷiyā vasena atthitā veditabbā.
anya-e0804n2:463_8: Tassāyamattho “ācariya bhavaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ akarā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:463_9: Apica “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe “tva”nti vacanaṁ vattabbamevāti adhippāyavasena “ācariya tvaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ karosī”ti yojanāpi kātabbāva.
anya-e0804n2:464_0: Akaro, akattha, akarotha. Akaraṁ, akaṁ, akaramha, akamha.
anya-e0804n2:464_2: akaṁ puḷinacetiya”nti pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Akattha, akatthuṁ. Akuruse,
anya-e0804n2:465_0: Ettha ca pañcavidho sekāro āharitvā dassetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:465_1: Tathā hi pañcavidho sekāro padāvayava apadāvayavaanekantapadāvayava sosaddattha ādesavasena.
anya-e0804n2:465_8: Ettha hi sekāro yadi pañcamīvibhattiyaṁ āmasevacanassāvayavo,
anya-e0804n2:465_16: Eseseti imassa hi “esoso eko ekaṭṭho”ti attho.
anya-e0804n2:465_19: Tattha “akaramhasa te kicca”nti imassa “akaramhase te kicca”nti attho.
anya-e0804n2:466_0: Akari, kari, akāsi, akaruṁ, akariṁsu, akaṁsu, akaṁsuṁ. Akaro, akarittha, akāsittha.
anya-e0804n2:467_0: Ettha ca akaroti tvaṁ akaroti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:467_1: “Akaro” iti hi padaṁ “varañce me ado sakkā”ti ettha majjhimapurisekavacanatthaṁ “ado”ti padamiva daṭṭhabbaṁ
anya-e0804n2:467_8: mā kho sūkaramukho ahū”tiādīsu pana māsaddayogato “tvaṁ pāpaṁ mā akāsi,
anya-e0804n2:467_9: mā sūkaramukho ahosī”ti padayojanā kātabbā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:468_0: Akariṁ, kariṁ, akāsiṁ, akarimha, karimha, akāsimha. Akarā, akarū. Akaruse,
anya-e0804n2:469_13: Tathā kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma. Kāhiti, kāhinti.
anya-e0804n2:470_0: Akarissā, akarissa, akarissaṁsūti sesaṁ sabbaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Kālātipattivasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:472_0: Kayiratu, kayirantu. Sesaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:474_0: Tattha kayirāti idaṁ “puññañce puriso kayirā”ti dassanato paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:474_1: “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti etthāpi “sārathi bhavaṁ adhammaṁ kareyyā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:474_3: Atha vā “kayirāsī”ti vattabbe sikāralopaṁ katvā “kayirā”ti majjhimapurisavacanaṁ vuttanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:475_1: yathā “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti pāḷiyaṁ “labhethā”ti imassa padassa “sabbhireva samāsetha,
anya-e0804n2:475_2: sabbhi kubbetha santhava”ntiādīsu “samāsethā”tiādīnaṁ viya paṭhamapurisavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā purisavipallāsaṁ
anya-e0804n2:475_4: tathā tumhehipi “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha “kayirā”ti padassa purisavipallāsaṁ katvā “kareyyāsī”ti majjhimapurisavasenattho vattabbo,
anya-e0804n2:475_6: evaṁ santepi aṭṭhakathācariyehi vohāratthesu paramakosallasamannāgatattā “tva”nti vattabbe atthe bhavaṁsaddo pavattati,
anya-e0804n2:475_7: “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe tvaṁsaddo pavattatīti cintetvā adhippāyatthavasena “kareyyāsī”ti attho vutto,
anya-e0804n2:475_9: Tathā hi “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “labhethā”ti ulliṅgitvā “labheyya”nti purisavipallāsavasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0804n2:475_10: “Adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti imassa pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “kayirā”ti ulliṅgitvā “kareyyāsī”ti vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n2:475_11: tasmā “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha purisavipallāso na cintetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:475_12: Atha vā yathā “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti ettha ca “kāye rajo na limpethā”tiādīsu ethavacanaṁ gahitaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:475_13: evaṁ ethavacanaṁ aggahetvā “labhe athā”ti padacchedo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0804n2:475_15: Tattha labheti sattamiyā uttamapurisavacanaṁ “vajjhañcāpi pamocaye”ti padamiva.
anya-e0804n2:475_17: Ettha ca adhikārantaravasena aparampi varaṁ puttaṁ labheyyanti attho.
anya-e0804n2:475_19: yasmā cetesu dvīsu dujjāno bhagavato adhippāyo,
anya-e0804n2:476_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi liṅgavipallāso vibhattivipallāso vacanavipallāso kālavipallāso purisavipallāso akkharavipallāsoti
anya-e0804n2:476_2: tathāpi so upari āvibhavissatīti na dassito.
anya-e0804n2:476_3: Tatra kayirāthāti padaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena attanopadavasena ca dvidhā bhijjati,
anya-e0804n2:476_6: dadantā aparāpara”nti ettha “kayirāthā”ti idaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:476_8: “Kayirātha dhīro puññānī”ti ettha pana “kayirāthā”ti idaṁ sattamiyā attanopadavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:476_10: Idha parokkhādivasena yirapaccayasahitāni rūpāni yebhuyyena sāsane appasiddhānīti na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n2:477_8: Kārāpetīti kārāpako. Karaṁ, kubbaṁ, krubbaṁ, karonto, kubbanto, kubbāno, kurumāno,
anya-e0804n2:477_18: Ettha kriyāsaddo kiñcāpi “aphalā hoti akrubbato”tiādīsu kakārarakārasaṁyogavantāni padāni dissanti,
anya-e0804n2:477_19: tathāpi klesasaddo viya pāḷiyaṁ na dissati,
anya-e0804n2:477_20: adissamānopi so aṭṭhakathācariyādīhi garūhi gahitattā gahetabbova.
anya-e0804n2:478_0: Kātuṁ, kattuṁ. Kātave, kāretuṁ. Katvā, katvāna, kātuna, karitvā,
anya-e0804n2:479_2: Akkharacintakā pana saddasatthanayaṁ nissāya “adhikicca” iti rūpaṁ icchanti,
anya-e0804n2:479_3: mayaṁ panetādisaṁ rūpaṁ pāḷiyā anukūlaṁ na hotīti na icchāma.
anya-e0804n2:479_4: Tathā hi therikāgāthāyaṁ gotamiyā parinibbānavacane “padakkhiṇaṁ kacca nipacca pāde”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n2:479_6: Kaccāti padassa dassanena adhikaccāti padampi diṭṭhameva hoti,
anya-e0804n2:480_0: Idāni karotissa dhātussa appamattakaṁ atthātisayayogaṁ kathayāma –
anya-e0804n2:481_0: Tatra taṇhaṅkaroti veneyyānaṁ taṇhaṁ lobhaṁ karoti hiṁsatīti taṇhaṅkaro.
anya-e0804n2:481_1: Atha vā rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā attani sakalalokassa taṇhaṁ sinehaṁ karoti janetīti taṇhaṅkaro.
anya-e0804n2:481_4: Sante na kurute piyanti sappurise attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:481_5: Atha vā piyaṁ piyāyamāno tussamāno modamāno sante na kurute na sevatīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:481_6: Yathā “rājānaṁ sevatī”ti etasmiṁ atthe rājānaṁ piyaṁ kuruteti saddasatthavidū mantenti,
anya-e0804n2:482_1: “parikkhāroti sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhittaṁ hotī”tiādīsu parivāro vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:485_0: Jāgara niddakkhaye. Jāgaroti. Jāgaraṁ. Dīghā jāgarato ratti.
anya-e0804n2:486_0: Tanādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:493_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
